op">You asked several questions, so I'll take them one at a time:<br><br>1)=
 you hope what? that i made a fool out of myself or that i called it in or =
perhaps both?  <br><br>I hope you called it in. Your resistance to giv=
ing the police information you said you thought you had on a child abductor=
, even after several prompts, makes me hope you did call it in, and didn't =
just say that to stop me from prompting you. I don't know of course, I am n=
ot there. I have no desire that you make a fool of yourself, but if it help=
s save a child from am abductor, I think it would be worth it.<br><br>2) Wh=
y don't you get on the box, and do some asking? <br><br>As I have said in t=
he past, my experience with those boxes has shown me nothing paranormal yet=
.  However, people continue to say there is more to it than my experie=
nce.  And so, I am keeping an open mind and trying to examine the evid=
ence you provide.<br><br>3) Why are negative people on
 these lists anyway.=
 if you guys don't believe in this type of technology, why the heck are you=
 all here? <br><br>If I had absolulely no belief that there might be someth=
ing interesting going on with the technology, I would not have been so insi=
stent that you give your information to the police.  How could a perso=
n, of good conscience, not prompt you to give that information to the polic=
e?  Again how is that a negative thing to do?<br><br>Wouldn't the real=
ly negative thing be to ignore it?<br><br><br><br><br><br>--- On <b>Tue, 7/=
